definition: a monument/an upright stone tablet/stele/CL:塊|块[kuai4],面[mian4]
Five tombstone inscriptions (1628), written by Zhang Pu 張溥|张溥[Zhang1 Pu3]

sentences.english: Father and son unexpectedly found that jiang yuan birth mothers tomb was destroyed.
sentences.chinese: 父子二人發現蔣元生母的墓碑竟遭人破壞。

sentences.english: On Revenue avenue, the grave traveler jumped the gravestone bravely .
sentences.chinese: 在稿收大道上，嚴肅的旅行者勇敢地跳過墓碑。

sentences.english: The cemetery hosted a profusion of table tombs, headstones, and memorials.
sentences.chinese: 墓地裏滿是桌形墓穴，墓碑，和紀念堂。

sentences.english: And I just started noticing inscriptions on the tombstones , epitaphs.
sentences.chinese: 而且我恰好開始注意到墓碑及墓誌上的銘文。

sentences.english: The tombstones were splayed out in a large V on the gym floor.
sentences.chinese: 這些墓碑在地板上擺成一個大型的V字。

sentences.english: After recording the location of the cemetery, document the inscriptions on the headstones .
sentences.chinese: 找出墓園的位置後，將墓碑上的碑文記錄下來。

sentences.english: On his tombstone, he would like the phrase “at least he never walked”.
sentences.chinese: 他希望自己的墓碑上刻“至少他從未走過。”

sentences.english: Carved on Tracy's gravestone is a car rolling down a mountain road.
sentences.chinese: 特蕾西的墓碑上刻有一輛沿着山路向下疾駛的小轎車。

sentences.english: Some of the headstones have birthdates near my brother's;
sentences.chinese: 從那些墓碑上我看到，他們的生日跟哥哥的很接近。

sentences.english: Her gaze stayed on the grave.
sentences.chinese: 她的目光盯在了那墓碑上。

sentences.english: IS graves gravestone, since the Han Dynasty had also been before.
sentences.chinese: 是則冢墓碑，自後漢以來始有也。
濟慈只希望一個無名的墓碑。

sentences.english: He noticed the mistress’s gravestone. “She wasn’t a target of opportunists, too?”
sentences.chinese: 他注意到了那情婦的墓碑。

sentences.english: His is buried in Green River Cemetery and a large boulder marks the spot.
sentences.chinese: 他被葬於綠河公墓中，用一塊大圓石作爲他的墓碑。

sentences.english: Gravestone of Fataaki, king of Nieue, outside Ekalesia Church.
sentences.chinese: 新教教堂外的紐埃國王法塔基的墓碑。

sentences.english: A tombstone is erected in memory of whoever it commemorates.
sentences.chinese: 墓碑是爲紀念它所紀念的人而建的。

definition: grave/tomb/graveyard/cemetery/fig. one's native place (where one's ancestors are buried)
